title: CONTEST: Most spirited sports fan
text: Calling all high school athletics fans! Welcome to the High School Sports Most-Spirited Fan Contest. The Fort Collins Coloradoan is looking for the most-spirited fans in the Northern Colorado area. Are you it? If you're a person (or you know someone) with big-time school spirit, enter in the contest. Then gather your friends and family to vote for you or the person you nominated. The person with the most votes will be deemed the winner. They and one guest will be invited to our May 17 High School Sports Awards Banquet . Plus you'll get bragging rights! Good luck.
